title: Launch a Domain in Under 5 Minutes
subtitle: Use Quick Launch to go from a syllabus PDF to a working AI tutor in one flow

objectives: Use Quick Launch to create a domain from a syllabus

steps.title: Welcome
steps.description: Quick Launch is the fastest path from course material to a working AI tutor. Upload a file, pick a style, and the system builds everything for you.

content.body:
# Launch a Domain in Under 5 Minutes

You have a syllabus, a textbook, or course notes. You want an AI tutor that teaches this material.

**Quick Launch** does it all:

1. Upload your file
2. Pick a teaching style
3. AI analyzes and creates everything
4. Review and go live

No manual spec configuration. No playbook assembly. Just upload and launch.

## Time: ~5 minutes

Use **arrow keys** to navigate.

steps.reason: Quick Launch eliminates the multi-step manual setup process, making it accessible to operators who don't know the spec system.
steps.goal: Understand what Quick Launch does and when to use it

steps.title: Open Quick Launch
steps.description: Navigate to Quick Launch from the sidebar. It's highlighted in the Home section because it's the recommended starting point for new operators.
steps.reason: Quick Launch is designed to be the first thing new operators use. It's prominently placed in the sidebar Home section.

steps.title: Upload Your Syllabus
steps.description: The wizard starts by asking for your course material. Drop a PDF, DOCX, or TXT file. The AI will extract subjects, teaching points, and learning objectives automatically.

content.alt: Quick Launch wizard step 1: file upload

steps.reason: The upload step is where all the magic starts. The AI analyzes the document structure, extracts key concepts, and builds a teaching plan.

tips.message: Structured documents (with headings, chapters, numbered sections) give the best results

aiContext.currentView: Quick Launch wizard — file upload step
aiContext.action: Uploading course material for AI analysis

steps.title: Pick a Teaching Style
steps.description: Choose how the AI tutor should interact with learners. Each persona defines personality traits, communication style, and pedagogical approach.

content.alt: Quick Launch wizard — teaching style selection

steps.reason: The teaching style defines WHO the tutor is. A patient tutor behaves differently from an intensive coach. This choice shapes every conversation.

tips.message: Start with the default tutor persona — you can customize it later in the Specs page

aiContext.action: Choosing a teaching style/persona for the tutor

steps.title: Review AI Analysis
steps.description: The AI has analyzed your content and generated a complete domain configuration. Review the extracted subjects, assertions, and recommended specs before committing.

content.alt: Quick Launch review panel with AI analysis results

steps.reason: Always review before committing. The AI extracts teaching points and organizes them, but you should verify the structure matches your curriculum.

tips.message: Check that key topics weren't missed — you can always add more content later

aiContext.currentView: Quick Launch review panel with generated configuration
aiContext.action: Reviewing AI-generated domain configuration before committing

steps.title: Domain Ready!
steps.description: Your domain is live. The system created a domain, identity spec, content source, playbook, and a test caller — all from one file upload.

content.body:
# Your Domain is Live

Quick Launch created everything you need:

- **Domain** — configured and active
- **Identity Spec** — tutor personality set
- **Content Source** — syllabus imported with assertions
- **Playbook** — all specs bundled and published
- **Test Caller** — ready to try the tutor

## What's Next?

1. **Test it** — Open the Simulator and chat with your tutor
2. **Invite callers** — Use the invite system to bring in real learners
3. **Customize** — Refine specs, add more content, adjust parameters
4. **Monitor** — Track caller progress on the Goals page

## Related Demos

- *Test Your Tutor Before Going Live* (DEMO-SIM-001)
- *Track a Caller's Learning Journey* (DEMO-CALLER-001)
- *Add Trusted Teaching Content* (DEMO-CONTENT-001)

steps.reason: Quick Launch is the fastest path to a working tutor, but it's just the start. The real value comes from testing, iterating, and monitoring.
steps.goal: Confirm domain creation and understand next steps
